channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Ozempic may help manage opioid addiction: study
item.description: Patients on semaglutide were less than half as likely to overdose as those on insulin.

item.title: Account suspensions have tripled on X since Elon Musk took over
item.description: First transparency report since 2022 shows scope of change.

item.title: Meta unveils cheaper $299 Quest 3S VR headset
item.description: Meta announced the Quest 3S, the latest virtual-reality headset to come out of the company's Reality Labs division and a cheaper offering than its pre...

item.title: Goldman recommends buying Tesla call options before two big catalysts in October
item.description: This options trade could make a profit if Tesla's robotaxi event next month gives the stock a boost.

item.title: Wells Fargo employee dying at her desk ‘sheds light on the reality of what it means’ to work at the bank, says union
item.description: You're either killing yourself or you're not enough,” an employee told the union.

item.title: Is this a new trillion-dollar reason for investors to stay bullish on Nvidia?

item.title: Dow down 200 points at midday, even as S&P 500 hovers near record heights
We keep celebrating low unemployment—but data shows jobs and economic activity have been shifting to big business
item.description: A one-size-fits-all approach has dominated economic policy and has favored bigger, more established, and less dynamic businesses.

item.title: Miami is at risk of a housing bubble
item.description: “Miami now shows the highest bubble risk among the cities in this study,” UBS said.
